resources.string: Press the button below to access the cell network information
Detected femtocell and Airplane Mode is now on.
Click the button below to manually turn on Airplane mode.

iSEC’s Femtocatcher uses the network identifier to detect if you are attached to a femtocell, and if so, places you into Airplane mode.
If you exit Airplane Mode, and are still connected to a femtocell – Airplane Mode will be re-enabled, as long as the ‘Block Femtocells’ box is checked.
It cannot protect you if the cellular tower lies about its identifier.
This Femtocatcher is Open Source, and is located on Github.

iSEC’s Femtocatcher uses the network identifier to detect if you are attached to a femtocell, and if so, will notify you.
It cannot protect you if the cellular tower lies about its identifier.
This Femtocatcher is Open Source, and is located on Github.
